properties.Name: CustomerPartyAuthorization
properties.Description:
The one or more persons/employees authorized to sign invoices on behalf of the Customer.    

Ex:
A 'party' might be an attorney given Power Of Attorney on behalf of the Customer.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: PositionStartDate
Columns.Description: The starting date that the person held the associated officer title.

Columns.Name: AuthorizationTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Authorization Type.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated authorization is granted.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated authorization is granted.

Columns.Name: MinimumAmount
Columns.Description:
The minimum point of the 'signing authority' for which the signer has authority.

Ex:
Contracts from $100- $100,000 in value
Invoices from $0-$5,000

Columns.Name: MaximumAmount
Columns.Description:
The maximum point of the 'signing authority' for which the signer has authority.

Ex:
Contracts from $100- $100,000 in value
Invoices from $0-$5,000

Columns.Name: AuthorizationNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the associated authorization.
